description: Ex-fianc√© of Yasaburou. Engagement was called off by her father after the death of Yasaburou`s father. Despite this it seems she still intends to marry Yasaburou as she still maintains close contact with his family. She is seen on several occasions she was looking out for Yasaburou and also filled in Yasaburou`s daily responsibilities whenever he is not around. Till this day Yasaburou is the only one who hasn`t seen her face because she is maintaining the tradition where the bride and groom can not see the face of each other till the day of their marriage.
name: Ebisugawa Kaisei
